name: OneShot2D
description:
OneShot2D is a compilation of two little games with two really basic concept : In the first one you need to clean a room with only one bullet and a Shield to push it, In the second the only one action you can do is dashing throught a room full of spikes. Watch out, you only have one minute to finish each level ! 

IMPORTANT ! USE SPACE TO SHOOT THE BALL ON THE FIRST GAME :D
